Class DelegatingInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.catchexception.internal.DelegatingInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.mockito.cglib.proxy.Callback, org.mockito.cglib.proxy.MethodInterceptor

    public class DelegatingInterceptor
extends Object
implements org.mockito.cglib.proxy.MethodInterceptor
    This interceptor delegates the method call to the target object.
